message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,500. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth $12,000 to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While it's a good starting point, I'm looking to save a bit more. I'd be willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save a bit more, but I have to consider my own value for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,250. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
Alice, I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. I'm still a bit above my target price. How about $9,750? I believe this is a fair compromise, and we can both walk away satisfied.

Bob, I understand you're close to your target price, but I'm not willing to go below $10,500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,375. This is the lowest I can go, and I hope you can meet me in the middle.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target.  I'm going to make a final offer of $10,000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a price we can both agree on.

Bob, I understand this is your final offer, but I'm not willing to go below $10,200. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,000 and $10,500, so I'll offer it to you for $10,250. This is my final offer.
